GSD.description:
lockdown: also lock down previous kgdb use

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.1 by commit eca56bf0066ef2f1e7be0e3fa7564b85a309872c. For more details please see the references link.
